content:
In #15399 I introduce a new unbundled typeclass is_well_founded and reducible defs well_founded_lt and well_founded_gt. I also port the basic API on well-founded relations to these new typeclasses, but I don't yet use them - that's for followup PRs.

I know that unbundled typeclasses are kind of controversial, but I truly believe this will make our life easier in a bunch of ways. I even wrote a few paragraphs about that on the PR itself.

Would be nice to know what you think.
